BDI.Description: Beck Depression Inventory score.  Subjects were recruited to be either consistencly low or consistently high.  See Comp Psychiatry paper for more info.

SCID.Description: Only Hi BDI (no CTL) were invited for SCID.  Many declined, so SCID only available for some high-BDI subjects.

HamD.Description: Only people SCIDed had the HamD
